named-query.name: ZipMaster.updateStatusForJobIds
named-query.query: UPDATE ZipMaster zm SET zm.zipProcessingStatus = :newStatus WHERE zm.id IN :jobIds AND zm.zipProcessingStatus IN :statusesToUpdate

named-query.name: ZipMaster.findByIdWithJob
named-query.query: SELECT zm FROM ZipMaster zm JOIN FETCH zm.processingJob WHERE zm.id = :id
